title: Wild and Outside: How a Renegade Minor League Revived the Spirit of Baseball in America's Heartland
description: A gifted writer and former reporter for the Associated Press chronicles the birth of the Northern League--which includes the St. Paul Saints, Duluth-Superior Dukes, Sioux Falls Canaries, Sioux City Explorers, Thunder Bay Whiskey Jacks, and Winnipeg Goldeyes--and in the process, discovers what baseball really means in America. Photos.
author: Stefan Fatsis
